room.name: The forest
room.long_description: The forest is bright green, but darkened from the thick canopy. you can see a massive redwood to the north

room.name: The big tree
room.long_description: A massive redwood looms over the area, casting a giant shadow behind you. there is a river to the east.

room.name: The river
room.short_description: A medium sized river blocks any entry across
room.long_description: A medium sized river rushes past the area, gleaming with fish and minerals. From the look of it, it seems to deep to cross

room.name: north river bank
room.short_description: The banks of a river, now significantly narrowed
room.long_description: The river narrows to a crossable distance, with the water still gushing strongly. To the west is a dead tree

room.name: the dead tree
room.short_description: A dead tree sits in the middle of an open field
room.long_description: A small dead tree sits alone in the middle of a small field. The tree is covered in moss.

item.name: compass
item.desc: A worn down yet functional compass
